title: Female Juvenile Killed After Accidental Shooting
content:
CHATTANOOGA (WDEF) – East Ridge Police say a female juvenile accidentally shot herself over the holiday weekend.
According to the police report, the juvenile brought a pistol to Dogwood Place Apartments to show off.
Police believe she unloaded all but one round and then placed the pistol to her head.
As a witness reportedly tried to stop her, the gun went off.
No charges have been filed against the witness.
